ref: 2813 karōṭi f. ʻ cup, skull ʼ Rājat., ˚ṭa -- m. lex. 2. *karōṭṭi- [Prob. ← Drav. Mal. kuraṭṭa, Tu. koraṇṭu ʻ nut ʼ, Kan. karaṭa ʻ coconut shell ʼ, Tam. ciraṭṭai ʻ coconut shell, begging bowl ʼ T. Burrow TPS 1945, 88]
Pa. karōṭi -- f., ˚ṭika -- ʻ basin, bowl, skull ʼ, ˚ṭiya<-> ʻ skull ʼ;
Pk. karōḍa -- ʻ coconut ʼ, ˚aga -- m. ʻ cup ʼ, karōḍī -- , ˚ḍiyā -- f. ʻ wide -- mouthed vessel ʼ, ˚ḍī -- f. ʻ skull ʼ.
